title: Spicy chicken with vegetable ragù
description: Spice up chicken breasts or thighs with this simple, low-fat spicy marinade that can prepared the day before.Each serving provides 618kcal, 79g protein, 23g carbohydrate (of which 21g sugars), 21g fat (of which 3.5g saturates), 10g fibre and 0.5g salt.
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 red pepper, seeds removed, flesh chopped
sprig fresh oregano, finely chopped leaves only
